Thanks, ctang...burned easily, works and looked great. Appreciate it!! :-)

i have never tried clonedvd2 or whatever it is.  i use an old version of Nero (Nero 7) and dont upgrade because i personally think the new Nero's suck ass.  i have never used anything other than Nero to burn my movies.  when i make custom dvds using ConvertXToDVD i dont even use that program for the burning process, i throw it into nero after conversion.  i might give it a go some day but when i find a program i really like i stick with it.  and i very rarely update my software because sometimes an updated program sucks terribly.

zombifuzz: i know exactly how you feel, thats actually why i suggested this program...i really dont use it for burning dvd's though...for me, its primarily used for getting rid of all the extra crap on dvd's...and you get to keep the main menu...usually when i burn a disc, all i want is the main feature and the main menu and thats what clonedvd2 allows me to achieve
